languages.text: {n}Бормочущий шепот старика заглушает сильный голос Иокасты.{/n} "Домин'{name} ведает истину. То сделано было — и так я велел. Не оскорбление госпо{mf|дину|же}, но... дар пророческий. Руки мои свершили гадание, которого ради пречистые мученики отдали души свои, тела свои в Его объятия твердые. В красных реках их жизней тлеющих видел я: бурливую нечистоту, отсеки марающую. К священно{mf|му|й} цар{mf|ю|ице} ковчега тянущуюся".

{n}The old man's murmur drowns out Sauerback's relentless voice:{/n} "Domin'{name} knows the truth. So it was done, for so I did will. It was no affront, but... a prophecy. For my hands to divine, unsullied martyrs offered their souls and bodies into His imperishable embrace. I gazed into the red rivers of their smouldering lives, and I did see. A roiling unclean staining the bays, reaching for the anointed {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark."
languages.original_text: {n}Бормочущий шепот старика заглушает сильный голос Иокасты.{/n} "Домин'{name} ведает истину. То сделано было — и так я велел. Не оскорбление госпо{mf|дину|же}, но... дар пророческий. Руки мои свершили гадание, которого ради пречистые мученики отдали души свои, тела свои в Его объятия твердые. В красных реках их жизней тлеющих видел я: бурливую нечистоту, отсеки марающую. К священно{mf|му|й} цар{mf|ю|ице} ковчега тянущуюся".

languages.text: {n}El murmullo del anciano ahoga la voz implacable de Sauerback:{/n} «Domin'{name} conoce la verdad. Así se hizo, pues esa fue mi voluntad. No fue ninguna afrenta, sino... una profecía. Para que mis manos pudieran adivinar, mártires inmaculados ofrecieron sus cuerpos y almas a Su abrazo imperecedero. Escudriñé los ríos rojos de sus vidas ardientes y la vi: una impureza turbulenta que mancilla las bahías, extendiéndose hacia {mf|el señor|la señora} ungid{mf|o|a} del Arca».
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's murmur drowns out Sauerback's relentless voice:{/n} "Domin'{name} knows the truth. So it was done, for so I did will. It was no affront, but... a prophecy. For my hands to divine, unsullied martyrs offered their souls and bodies into His imperishable embrace. I gazed into the red rivers of their smouldering lives, and I did see. A roiling unclean staining the bays, reaching for the anointed {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark."

No fue ninguna afrenta, sino... una profecía. Para que mis manos pudieran adivinar, mártires inmaculados ofrecieron sus cuerpos y almas a Su abrazo imperecedero. Escudriñé los ríos rojos de sus vidas ardientes y la vi: una impureza turbulenta que mancilla las bahías, extendiéndose hacia {mf|el señor|la señora} ungid{mf|o|a} del Arca».

languages.text: {n}老人のブツブツ言う声が、ザウアーバックの激しい声をかき消す。{/n}「ドミン・{name}は真実を知っている。だからもういいのだ、それでいい。それは侮辱ではなく…予言だ。この手を神のものにして、穢れのない殉教者たちが魂と肉体を主の不滅の抱擁に捧げた。私は彼らの燃え盛る命の赤い川を眺めて、そして『見た』のだ。入り江を汚し、聖油で清められし陛下の箱舟へと達する騒々しい穢れを」
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's murmur drowns out Sauerback's relentless voice:{/n} "Domin'{name} knows the truth. So it was done, for so I did will. It was no affront, but... a prophecy. For my hands to divine, unsullied martyrs offered their souls and bodies into His imperishable embrace. I gazed into the red rivers of their smouldering lives, and I did see. A roiling unclean staining the bays, reaching for the anointed {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人のブツブツ言う声が、ザウアーバックの激しい声をかき消す。{/n}「エニム・{name}は真実を知っている。だからもういいのだ、それでいい。それは侮辱ではなく…予言だ。この手を神のものにして、穢れのない殉教者たちが魂と肉体を主の不滅の抱擁に捧げた。私は彼らの燃え盛る命の赤い川を眺めて、そして『見た』のだ。入り江を汚し、聖油で清められし陛下の箱舟へと達する騒々しい穢れを」

languages.text: {n}老人喃喃的低语声盖过了苏尔贝克冰冷的声音。{/n}“秘者{name}知道真相。事情确实如此，因为我确实做过这样的事情。这并不是冒犯，而是……预言。我亲手进行了占卜，从未遭受过玷污的殉道者将他们的灵魂与躯体献给了祂不朽的怀抱。他们的生命熊熊燃烧，我凝视着那红色的河流，我看到了未来。汹涌而至的污秽玷污了甲板，向神选的方舟之主袭来。”
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's murmur drowns out Sauerback's relentless voice:{/n} "Domin'{name} knows the truth. So it was done, for so I did will. It was no affront, but... a prophecy. For my hands to divine, unsullied martyrs offered their souls and bodies into His imperishable embrace. I gazed into the red rivers of their smouldering lives, and I did see. A roiling unclean staining the bays, reaching for the anointed {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark."

traits.locale_text: {n}老人喃喃的低语声盖过了苏尔贝克冰冷的声音。{/n}“秘者{name}知道真相。事情确实如此，因为我确实做过这样的事情。这并不是冒犯，而是……预言。我亲手进行了占卜，从未遭受过玷污的殉道者将他们的灵魂与躯体献给了祂不朽的怀抱。他们的生命熊熊燃烧，我凝视着那红色的河流，我看到了未来。汹涌而至的污秽玷污了甲板，向神选的方舟之主袭来。”

languages.text: {n}Das Murmeln des alten Mannes übertönt Sauerbacks gnadenlose Stimme:{/n} "Domin'{name} kennt die Wahrheit. So ist es geschehen, denn so wollte ich es. Es war keine Beleidigung, sondern ... eine Prophezeiung. Unbefleckte Märtyrer boten ihre Seelen und Körper seiner unvergänglichen Umarmung an, auf dass meine Hände weissagen können. Ich blickte in die roten Flüsse ihrer brennenden Leben und ich sah. Eine wirbelnde Unsauberkeit, die die Module befleckt, die sich nach {mf|dem gesegneten Lord|der gesegneten Lady} der Arche ausstreckt."
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's murmur drowns out Sauerback's relentless voice:{/n} "Domin'{name} knows the truth. So it was done, for so I did will. It was no affront, but... a prophecy. For my hands to divine, unsullied martyrs offered their souls and bodies into His imperishable embrace. I gazed into the red rivers of their smouldering lives, and I did see. A roiling unclean staining the bays, reaching for the anointed {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Murmeln des alten Mannes übertönt Sauerbacks gnadenlose Stimme:{/n} "Domin'{name} kennt die Wahrheit. So ist es geschehen, denn so wollte ich es. Es war keine Beleidigung, sondern ... eine Prophezeiung. Unbefleckte Märtyrer boten ihre Seelen und Körper seiner unvergänglichen Umarmung an, auf dass meine Hände weissagen können. Ich blickte in die roten Flüsse ihrer brennenden Leben und ich sah. Eine wirbelnde Unsauberkeit, die die Module befleckt, die sich nach {mf|dem gesegneten Lord|der gesegneten Lady} der Arche ausstreckt."

languages.text: {n}Les murmures du vieil homme noient la voix implacable de Sauerback :{/n} « Domin'{name} connaît la vérité. Il en a été fait selon mes instructions. Ce n'était pas un affront, mais... une prophétie. Pour que mes mains décèlent la vérité, des martyres au cœur pur se sont livrés corps et âme à Son impérissable étreinte. J'ai sondé du regard les rivières rouges de leurs vies évanescentes, et c'est là que je l'ai vue. Une abjection rampante qui sévit dans les entrailles du vaisseau et cherche à atteindre {mf|le seigneur consacré|la maîtresse consacrée} de l'Arche. »
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's murmur drowns out Sauerback's relentless voice:{/n} "Domin'{name} knows the truth. So it was done, for so I did will. It was no affront, but... a prophecy. For my hands to divine, unsullied martyrs offered their souls and bodies into His imperishable embrace. I gazed into the red rivers of their smouldering lives, and I did see. A roiling unclean staining the bays, reaching for the anointed {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les murmures du vieil homme noient la voix implacable de Sauerback :{/n} « Domin'{name} connaît la vérité. Il en a été fait selon mes instructions. Ce n'était pas un affront, mais... une prophétie. Pour que mes mains décèlent la vérité, des martyres au cœur pur se sont livrés corps et âme à Son impérissable étreinte. J'ai sondé du regard les rivières rouges de leurs vies évanescentes, et c'est là que je l'ai vue. Une abjection rampante qui sévit dans les entrailles du vaisseau et cherche à atteindre {mf|le seigneur consacré|la maîtresse consacrée} de l'Arche. »

languages.text: {n}İhtiyar adamın mırıltıları, Sauerback'in amansız sesini bastırıyor.{/n} "Domin'{name} hakikati biliyor. Ben böylesini buyurduğum için böyle yapıldı. Hakaret maksadı taşımıyordu, yalnızca... Bir kehanetti. Zira ellerim, şehitlerin lekesiz ve kutsal ruhlarıyla bedenlerini O'nun ebedî himayesine taşımak içindir. Kor gibi yanan hayatlarının kızıl nehirlerini seyre daldım. Çalkantılı günahların koyları kirleterek Ark'ın kutsanmış {mf|Lordu'na|Leydisi'ne} pençelerini geçirmeye çalıştığını gördüm."
languages.original_text: {n}The old man's murmur drowns out Sauerback's relentless voice:{/n} "Domin'{name} knows the truth. So it was done, for so I did will. It was no affront, but... a prophecy. For my hands to divine, unsullied martyrs offered their souls and bodies into His imperishable embrace. I gazed into the red rivers of their smouldering lives, and I did see. A roiling unclean staining the bays, reaching for the anointed {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark."
